reasoning_bullet_points: Catalyst is liquidity-driven (Shelf Registration + Insider Selling), not a fundamental business failure.
Technical damage is severe: Price below SMA100 and Lower Bollinger Band indicates capitulation but trend is broken.
Fundamental divergence: Strong revenue growth (+13.4%) conflicts with negative Net Income and EPS miss.
Insider selling (EVP/CAO) contradicts the bullish AI narrative, creating a 'credibility gap' for investors.
